column4: I downloaded nero linux and untar'd it.  Now i have two folders with subdirs - 'etc' and 'usr'.  how can I install nerolinux from here?
i searchd the reps and couldnt find it
okay well i'll do that, but in the future.  if you untar'd it and had those two folders what would you do from there?
Why do you need nero? K3b works as good anyway.
